text: the menu container `header .inner .header__center` is absolute positioned, and it has a width of 66% instead of 100% as you want. That could be the issue
Thanks <@U01RBF0UXD0>, but this doesn't seem to fix the issue, and now it's instead created a gap between the top of the screen and the nav bar
Did you get this figured out?
Ok what is this supposed to look like?
Do you have a comp or somehting you can snag an image from?
Alignment/width should look like this one:

I see â€” so right now it looks like the height of your navigation is based off of the VW which controls the font size in this case of the nav items, and the VH which controls the padding on the list items in the nav.

I would opt to maybe set a min height on the nav then flex center the nav items so that they always are in the middle regardless of the size of the text.
